agenda.event: David Byrne Radio Presents: Christmas Music for People Who Hate Christmas Music
agenda.description: A playlist of rowdy, fun songs that gently poke at and refer to the holidays. Enjoy!

agenda.event: Ora Sono Un Lago by Bono / Burattini
agenda.description: A new album by Bono / Burattini, featuring dense and unforgiving songs with richly assembled textures and echoed out other-worldly choirs.

agenda.event: Dubcore Volume 26 by Gabber Dub Project
agenda.description: A new release from Gabber Dub Project, featuring tracks like Besaet, Dubsaet, and This Is Gabber Dub.

agenda.event: Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader
agenda.description: A new album from La Bande à Bader, featuring a mix of heavy breakbeat bass, stepper accents, and dnb influences.

contributions.title: Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader
contributions.description: Pétale Défoule is an album that opens with an intriguing 'Intro' and features tracks like 'Barbarie' and 'Slurpdub'. The album is a mix of heavy breaked bass, stepper accents, and dnb influences. Larsen's work is described as epic and percussive, blending with smooth melodies and virtuoso synths.

contributions.title: An Irish Almanac of Noise and Experimental Music From 2025 by Nyahh Records
contributions.description: Nyahh Records presents a collection of contemporary noise and experimental musicians from across the island of Ireland. This compilation includes 32 tracks covering noise, acoustic, electroacoustic, electronics, Musique Concrete, tape music, and drone.

contributions.title: Ora Sono Un Lago by Bono / Burattini
contributions.description: The new album by Bono / Burattini, 'Ora Sono Un Lago,' is a tenacious and brooding collection of work that testifies to the duo's growth and ghostly ability to immerse kosmische landscapes, stripped electronica, and oscillatory psychedelia.

contributions.title: Dubcore Volume 26 by Gabber Dub Project
contributions.description: A new release from Gabber Dub Project, featuring tracks like Besaet, Dubsaet, and This Is Gabber Dub. The album includes a mix of heavy dub and gabber influences.

contributions.title: Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader
contributions.description: Pétale Défoule is an album that opens with an intriguing 'Intro' and features tracks like 'Barbarie' and 'Slurpdub'. The album is a mix of heavy breaked bass, stepper accents, and dnb influences. Larsen's work is described as epic and percussive, blending with smooth melodies and virtuoso synths.

contributions.title: An Irish Almanac of Noise and Experimental Music From 2025 by Nyahh Records
contributions.description: Nyahh Records presents a collection of contemporary noise and experimental musicians from across the island of Ireland. This compilation includes 32 tracks covering noise, acoustic, electroacoustic, electronics, Musique Concrete, tape music, and drone.

newsletter.markdown:
# Newsletter Hebdomadaire - 2025-12-18

## Agenda

- **2025-12-17**: [David Byrne Radio Presents: Christmas Music for People Who Hate Christmas Music](https://www.davidbyrne.com/radio/david-byrne-radio-presents-christmas)
  A playlist of rowdy, fun songs that gently poke at and refer to the holidays. Enjoy!

- **2026-03-06**: Ora Sono Un Lago by Bono / Burattini
  A new album by Bono / Burattini, featuring dense and unforgiving songs with richly assembled textures and echoed out other-worldly choirs.

- **2025-12-16**: Dubcore Volume 26 by Gabber Dub Project
  A new release from Gabber Dub Project, featuring tracks like Besaet, Dubsaet, and This Is Gabber Dub.

- **2026-03-03**: Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader
  A new album from La Bande à Bader, featuring a mix of heavy breakbeat bass, stepper accents, and dnb influences.


## Contributions des Membres

### mbertier@parishq.net

- **[Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader](https://www.musiques-incongrues.net/d/15351-petale-defoule-by-la-bande-a-bader/1)**
  Pétale Défoule is an album that opens with an intriguing 'Intro' and features tracks like 'Barbarie' and 'Slurpdub'. The album is a mix of heavy breaked bass, stepper accents, and dnb influences. Larsen's work is described as epic and percussive, blending with smooth melodies and virtuoso synths.

- **[An Irish Almanac of Noise and Experimental Music From 2025 by Nyahh Records](https://www.musiques-incongrues.net/d/15355-an-irish-almanac-of-noise-and-experimental-music-from-2025-by-nyahh-records/1)**
  Nyahh Records presents a collection of contemporary noise and experimental musicians from across the island of Ireland. This compilation includes 32 tracks covering noise, acoustic, electroacoustic, electronics, Musique Concrete, tape music, and drone.

### rottweiller.slip@gmail.com

- **[Ora Sono Un Lago by Bono / Burattini](https://www.musiques-incongrues.net/d/15356-ora-sono-un-lago-by-bono-burattini/1)**
  The new album by Bono / Burattini, 'Ora Sono Un Lago,' is a tenacious and brooding collection of work that testifies to the duo's growth and ghostly ability to immerse kosmische landscapes, stripped electronica, and oscillatory psychedelia.

- **[Dubcore Volume 26 by Gabber Dub Project](https://www.musiques-incongrues.net/d/15353-dubcore-volume-26-by-gabber-dub-project/1)**
  A new release from Gabber Dub Project, featuring tracks like Besaet, Dubsaet, and This Is Gabber Dub. The album includes a mix of heavy dub and gabber influences.

### nota2k@gmail.com

- **[Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader](https://www.musiques-incongrues.net/d/15351-petale-defoule-by-la-bande-a-bader/1)**
  Pétale Défoule is an album that opens with an intriguing 'Intro' and features tracks like 'Barbarie' and 'Slurpdub'. The album is a mix of heavy breaked bass, stepper accents, and dnb influences. Larsen's work is described as epic and percussive, blending with smooth melodies and virtuoso synths.

- **[An Irish Almanac of Noise and Experimental Music From 2025 by Nyahh Records](https://www.musiques-incongrues.net/d/15355-an-irish-almanac-of-noise-and-experimental-music-from-2025-by-nyahh-records/1)**
  Nyahh Records presents a collection of contemporary noise and experimental musicians from across the island of Ireland. This compilation includes 32 tracks covering noise, acoustic, electroacoustic, electronics, Musique Concrete, tape music, and drone.


## Galerie

- ![Cover of Pétale Défoule by La Bande à Bader](https://f4.bcbits.com/img/a3736346285_16.jpg)

- ![Cover of Ora Sono Un Lago by Bono / Burattini](https://f4.bcbits.com/img/a1785496700_16.jpg)

- [Crank Sturgeon live performance](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ibbSzr6_HIw)
